info.name: NationStates Dark
info.description:
A Dark Theme made specifically for NationStates. This style is written to specifically work for NationStates only.

Initially began as a heavily modified version of the Better NationStates style by Orioni. Added changes of my own, resorting to looking at the source coding and tag syntax of NationStates to add more changes that would suit my tastes.
info.additionalInfo:
- Added a custom scroll bar.
- Added line that applies this theme specifically to NationStates.
- Expanded coding to include the NationStates Forums

<font color=#CC0000>To exclude all sites but NationStates and NationStates Forums:</font>

URLs starting with: https://forum.nationstates.net
URLs on the domain: www.nationstates.net
